entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:04 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. High minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
